categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shados was a Sith Lord and Sith Warrior of the reconstituted Sith Empire who fought on Ilum during the Galactic War. Shados and two other Sith Lords, Prejad and Wenom, killed the Galactic Republic's alien commandos and took over their forward camp, leading the Republic to launch a counterstrike and kill the three.
